de.codesourcery.eve.apiclient
Class HttpAPIClient

java.lang.Object
  de.codesourcery.eve.apiclient.AbstractHttpAPIClient
      de.codesourcery.eve.apiclient.HttpAPIClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAPIClient
public class HttpAPIClient
extends AbstractHttpAPIClient

Eve Online(tm) API client that works over HTTP. 

 Usage:
 
  final APIKey limitedKey = 
 	APIKey.createLimitedKey( "deadbeefdeadbeefdeadbeefdeadbeefdeadbeefdeadbeef" ); 

 final long userID = 1234567L;
       
 final Credentials credentials = 
 	new Credentials( userID , limitedKey );
		
 final HttpAPIClient client = 
 	new HttpAPIClient();
 
 try {
 	System.out.println("Server status: "+client.getServerStatus(null);
 
 	final APIResponse<Collection<IBaseCharacter>> responseFromServer = 
 		client.getAvailableCharacters( credentials , null );
 
 	for ( IBaseCharacter c : responseFromServer.getPayload() ) {
 		System.out.println("# Got character: "+c.getName()+" / character ID "+c.getCharacterId() );
 	}			
 } 
 finally {
 	client.dispose();
 }

Author:
tobias.gierke@code-sourcery.de

Constructor Detail

HttpAPIClient

public HttpAPIClient()
Constructs a client that connects to the default EVE Online(tm) API server. The default base URI currently is http://api.eve-online.com

See Also:
AbstractHttpAPIClient.setBaseURI(URI), HttpAPIClient(URI), HttpAPIClient(String)

                                                                                                                     IErrorHandler errorHandler)
                                                                                                              throws java.io.IOException
(thread-safe).

Parameters:
